## Executive Summary

This report analyzes weather patterns across major Australian cities using the [Rattle weather dataset](https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/jsphyg/weather-dataset-rattle-package/data). Key variables such as temperature, rainfall, and humidity,... were compared to uncover regional climate differences. The findings reveal distinct climate characteristics aligned with Australiaâ€™s diverse geography. These insights can support planning in agriculture, infrastructure, and public health.
